name: LAZER PINBALL 3D HYPERSPACE WARS
description: LAZER PINBALL 3D HYPERSPACE WARS Welcome...to the ULTIMATE pinball experience!!!!! Blast your way through the solar system as you encounter perilous threats, mysterious mysteries, and even a few friendly allies along the way. With REVOLUTIONARY 3D GRAPHICS and HYPERSPEED GAMEPLAY you'll be ADDICTED to the PINBALL MADNESS (wartime mental illness)!   Post your high scores in the comments below!
